'''Richard Ovenden''', [[Order of the British Empire|OBE]] [[Wikipedia:Fellow of the Society of Antiquaries of London|FSA]] [[Wikipedia:Fellow of the Royal Society of Arts|FRSA]] [[Wikipedia:Royal Historical Society|FRHistS]] (born [[25 March]] [[1964]]), is a British librarian and author who is currently the 25th [[Wikipedia:Bodley's Librarian|Bodley's librarian]] at the [[Bodleian Library]],<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.bodleian.ox.ac.uk/about/libraries/bodleys-librarian|articlename=Meet Bodley's Librarian|dated=|website=[https://www.bodleian.ox.ac.uk/ Bodleian Libraries]|accessed=6 May 2025}}</ref> having been appointed in [[2014]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20140301183737/http://www.ox.ac.uk/gazette/2013-2014/13february2014-no5050/notices/#appt1|articlename=Bodley's Librarian|dated=13 February 2014|website=University of Oxford Gazette|accessed=4 July 2025}}</ref> He is also the current head of the [[University of Oxford]]'s [https://www.glam.ox.ac.uk/home Gardens, Libraries and Museums] group.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.glam.ox.ac.uk/richard-ovenden|articlename=Richard Ovenden, OBE|dated=|website=[https://www.glam.ox.ac.uk/ Gardens, Libraries & Museums]|accessed=6 May 2025}}</ref>
